custom-analyzer.title: Example Analyzer - Counts File Type Analyzer
custom-analyzer.summary: Counts Number of each File Type Found in Deployment Unit.
custom-analyzer.description: The number of file types in a deployment unit isn't necessarily a measure of quality or security. This analyzer really just demonstrates how an analyzer could be built.

custom-analyzer.title: Example Analyzer - Form Method Analyzer
custom-analyzer.summary: Finds References to Form Method Attribute
